EmailTemplate.name: Associate Mentors Second Round 2013
EmailTemplate.subject: About your Associate Mentor Application: Through to second round!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for applying to be an Associate Mentor. We're delighted to tell you that you are through to the second round.
Please click on the link below to answer some additional questions for us.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=2fmp1utdralgb&q1={!Job_Application__c.Id}
We can then complete the processing of your application.
Many thanks!
The Challenge Society
